Working seamlessly with business line home offices, project sites, customer organizations and suppliers, our teams have delivered more than 125 projects since our inception in 1994.Our offices in Gurgaon, Vadodara and Chennai will grow significantly and sustainably with exciting career opportunities for both professionals and young graduates who are passionate about creating a cleaner, greener, and safer world; building transformational infrastructure; making decarbonization a reality; and protecting people and the environment.Summary:Responsible for handling a variety of technical activities performed in connection with Client Billing requirements. This position will be responsible for assessing commercial terms in Bechtel contracts and coordinating with the project team and the Job Accounting Data Base (JADB) accountant to set up Bechtel cost flows and terms of reimbursement. The Billing Supervisor role will be expected to initiate billing discussions for new projects (as directed by Mgr), coordinate receipt of required documentation and ensure that project invoicing activities are being handled appropriately.This position will also assist Billing Manager in reviewing journal vouchers and reconciliations prepared by Billing Team, gathering and preparing team metrics and performing other more complex analytical activities. The Billing Supervisor will also provide direction to other Billers within the team and assist them in understanding and performing assigned Billing activities. Supervises the day-to-day operations related to client and intercompany billing process. Reviews processes and procedures and makes recommendations for system enhancements. Reviews and approves accounting entries, client invoice packages, and account reconciliations. Provides day-to-day guidance on billing process inquiries. Assists in research for team's purview. Works closely with the Global Business Unit (GBU) on cost flow reviews for financials. Oversees and performs varied accounting or financial work requiring the standardized application of Corporate Policies and Management instructions, principals, concepts, and practices. Supervises internal and external audits or provides responses to inquiries associated with invoicing.Basic Qualifications:Read, Write, and Speak English Language.
Must have the legal right to work in New Delhi, India without sponsorship.
A B. Com degree from an accredited institution and MBA is preferred with emphasis in accounting or finance.
10-12 years of experience in Finance/Accounting related activities. Accounts Receivable/ Billing experience.Preferred Qualifications:Career-driven individuals looking to relocate to projects or rotate to other finance functions sometime in the future.
Proficiency with Microsoft Office Applications and computer literacy and technical skills necessary to gain proficiency with major ERP systems and software.
Good understanding of generally accepted accounting practices and techniques and strong analytical skills.
Must have strong organizational skills and be effective in a high volume, deadline driven work environment. Good initiative and capability to work independently while also functioning effectively within a team environment.
Must have good communication (oral and written) and interpersonal skills. Position requires significant interaction with other employees inside and outside the Billing Department including 3rd parties (non-Bechtel).
Good business judgment in execution of assigned work and in understanding when issues need to be escalated for resolution.
Must demonstrate leadership capabilities commensurate with requirements of a Billing Supervisor.Shaping tomorrow togetherBechtel is one of the most respected global engineering, construction, and project management companies.
